summary: Three strangers, each with a serious problem in their lives, share a sweepstakes ticket which they wished upon together before a Chinese idol.
cast: Sydney Greenstreet|Geraldine Fitzgerald|Peter Lorre|Joan Lorring|Robert Shayne|Marjorie Riordan|Arthur Shields|Rosalind Ivan|John Alvin|Peter Whitney|Alan Napier|Clifford Brooke|Doris Lloyd|Norman Ainsley|Edward Biby|Benny Burt|John Burton|Woody Chambliss|Tom Coleman|Alec Craig|Cyril Delevanti|Leslie Denison|Creighton Hale|Sam Harris|Holmes Herbert|Keith Hitchcock|Leyland Hodgson|Olaf Hytten|Fred Kelsey|Colin Kenny|Connie Leon|Stanley Logan|Stanley Mann|Thomas Martin|Tom Pilkington|Jeffrey Sayre|Reginald Sheffield|Leo White|Eric Wilton|Ian Wolfe
